product_name: The North Face Crimptastic Hybrid Down Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Don't sacrifice mobility for warmth; the Crimptastic Hybrid down jacket from The North Face offers insulation articulated by fleece paneling, enabling you to move freely even in the coldest climates. Ripstop nylon exterior offers wind-resistance and comfortable breathability. High-quality 600-fill down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) side panels, underarms, and forearms allow flexibility of movement where it's most needed for full mobility. The North Face Crimptastic Hybrid down jacket features 2 zippered hand pockets for easy storage and 1 internal security pocket to keep small valuables safe. Closeout.
short_description: Don't sacrifice mobility for warmth; the Crimptastic Hybrid down jacket from The North Face offers insulation articulated by fleece paneling, enabling you to move freely even in the coldest climates.
